primary.description: Primary text color for body copy and main content.

secondary.description: Secondary text color for less prominent information or subtext.

disabled.description: Text color for disabled interactive elements or content.

inverse.description: Text color for use on dark or colored backgrounds.

success.description: Text color for success messages or indicators.

warning.description: Text color for warning messages or indicators.

info.description: Text color for informational messages or indicators.

critical.description: Text color for critical errors or destructive action indicators.

primary.description: Primary/Default border color for UI elements and separators.

inverse.description: Border color for use on dark or colored backgrounds.

brand.description: Border color for brand emphasis or brand-related components.

success.description: Border color for success state indicators.

warning.description: Border color for warning state indicators.

info.description: Border color for informational state indicators.

critical.description: Border color for critical error state indicators.

inverse.description: Background color for inverse-themed sections or components.

surface.description: Default surface color for elements like cards, modals.

surface-hover.description: Background color for interactive surfaces on hover.

surface-selected.description: Background color for selected items or surfaces (brand-tinted).

surface-selected-hover.description: Background color for hovered selected items or surfaces.

surface-secondary.description: Secondary surface color for subtle differentiation or sections.

brand.description: Background color for primary brand actions or highlights.

brand-hover.description: Hover state for brand background color.

success.description: Background color for success messages or sections.

success-bold.description: Stronger background color for emphasized success states.

info.description: Background color for informational messages or sections.

info-bold.description: Stronger background color for emphasized info states.

warning.description: Background color for warning messages or sections.

critical.description: Background color for critical error messages or sections.

critical-bold.description: Stronger background color for emphasized critical/error states.
